subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador, who captured his third Tour de France last month, won the Castillon-la-Bataille criterium race in France ahead of Sylvain Chavanel in a sprint finish.
snippet: Alberto Contador, who captured his third Tour de France last month, won the Castillon-la-Bataille criterium race in France ahead of Sylvain Chavanel in a sprint finish.
